snippet: Donald Fehr, the executive director of the N.H.L. Players’ Association, said the proposal “still represents enormous reductions in player salaries and individual contracting rights.”
abstract: Donald Fehr, the executive director of the N.H.L. Players’ Association, said the proposal “still represents enormous reductions in player salaries and individual contracting rights.”

headline.main: Fehr Has Concerns About N.H.L.'s Latest Offer to Players
headline.print_headline: Optimism Over N.H.L. Proposal Is Quickly Doused
